name: Redistats – Multisite stats
author: TodaysWeb (Jim Westergren)

sections.description:
Stats are iframed from Redistats – see a demo here.

Features:

  • Works on a single blog as well as on multisite.
  • No ads and no branding.
  • Global stats of all the blogs on your Multisite.
  • Stats are collected and processed in real time.
  • High privacy.
  • High performance with no additional load to you.
  • This plugin is just 3 PHP files with around 200 lines of code in total.
  • Hosted on Github, Redistats-WP-Plugin, pull requests appreciated.
sections.installation:
1. Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.
  2. Go the plugin settings and follow the steps. Requires registration on Redistats.
sections.faq: This will be updated later, for the moment see the about page.
sections.changelog:
0.3

  • Added support for internationalization by adding a get parameter with the language code to the iframe.
  • Updating the button icon to the new offical one.

0.2

  • Fixed a bug with the url to the dashboard icon image.

0.1

  • Open beta release.

short_description: Web stats especially made for WordPress Multisite with a large number of blogs but also works on a single blog. No additional load on your server.
